name: Kings Gambit 2: A Treasure Hunters Story
name_original: Kings Gambit 2: A Treasure Hunters Story
description:
An open world final-fantasy type RPG. This game is the second in the Kings Gambit trilogy and is the prequel to the original game.

Play as Teeja and learn what twisted him and turned him to the path of evil. Discover the true story of the past.

This is the story of a lowly treasure hunter and his journey on the path of evil.

(Note: This game was converted to HTML format but this ended in countless bugs so I have provided a downloadable copy of the original game instead.)
